```{r}
life = read.csv("Life Expectancy Data.csv", stringsAsFactors = F)
newlife = na.omit(lifeexpect)
newlife = newlife[-c(12,19)]
newlife$Year = as.factor(newlife$Year)
newlife$Status = as.factor(newlife$Status)
str(newlife)

mod1 = lm(Life.expectancy ~ . - Country - Year, data = newlife)
summary(mod1)
```


```{r}
plot(newlife$Year, newlife$Life.expectancy)
plot(newlife$Status, newlife$Life.expectancy)
plot(newlife$Life.expectancy ~ newlife$Alcohol, xlab = "Alcohol", ylab = "life expectancy")
plot(newlife$Life.expectancy ~ newlife$GDP, xlab = "GDP per capita", ylab = "life expectancy")
plot(newlife$Life.expectancy ~ newlife$Schooling, xlab = "Schooling", ylab = "life expectancy")
plot(newlife$Life.expectancy ~ newlife$Alcohol, xlab = "Alcohol", ylab = "life expectancy")
plot(newlife$Life.expectancy ~ newlife$Hepatitis.B, xlab = "Hepatits Rate", ylab = "life expectancy")
plot(newlife$Life.expectancy ~ newlife$Total.expenditure, xlab = "Expenditure", ylab = "life expectancy")
plot(newlife$Life.expectancy ~ newlife$Income.composition.of.resources, xlab = "income", ylab = "life expectancy")
plot(newlife$Life.expectancy ~ newlife$Diphtheria, xlab = "Diphtheria", ylab = "life expectancy")
plot(newlife$Life.expectancy ~ newlife$BMI, xlab = "BMI", ylab = "life expectancy")
```

```{r}
trainlife<- life[1:floor(0.7*nrow(life)),]
testlife <- lifeexpect[-(1:floor(0.7*nrow(life))),]

mod2 <- lm()

train_predict = predict.lm(mod2, trainlife)
train_mse_predict = mean((train_predict - trainlife$Life.expectancy)^2)
test_predict = predict.lm(mod2, testlife)
test_mse_predict = mean((test_predict - testlife$Life.expectancy)^2)

train_mse_predict
test_mse_predict

```
